name: rainy paths
description:
This city isn't the same as it was a year ago.

You walk on through the rain.

A short interactive fiction made as an intro to my article "Branching Narratives", which you can read at https://sites.google.com/view/branchingnarratives/

Credits

Music - Isn't the rain nice today? by bbatv, released under CC-BY-3.0 on OpenGameArt.org

GIFs by Chride Lassheikki, using images (CC0) from Pixabay.com
Font - VT323 available on Google Fonts

Code inspiration for local storage from Eva Sydney Lee.

Made by Christina "Chride" Lassheikki using Twine (SugarCube) for the Playable Concepts project at Aalto University.
twitter.com/classheikki- christinalassheikki.com
